name: Mole Station
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2018 New Mexico Game Jam. The theme was "ten."

You are a group of 10 moles in the Plinko Mines. Gather gems and trek to each of the Plinko Stations. Win the high score token from each station and buy back the mines from the union rep.

Controls: arrow keys, z key, and x key.

Made with TIC-80.

Downloadable builds coming soon...
